Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.name: Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break old labyrinth
seals, are said to change the labyrinth's form each time.
The Pthumerian monarch was traditionally a woman
who assumed a name with classical roots.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Bloodletting Beast (Parasite) in Pthumeru Ihyll Layer Two.

Hintertomb Root Chalice.name: Hintertomb Root Chalice
Hintertomb Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break old labyrinth
seals, are said to change the labyrinth's form each time.
The hintertombs are unceremonious homes to graves
and death, cesspools of noxious snakes and insects.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Undead Giant (H. and Cannon) Boss in Hintertomb Layer Two.

Central Pthumeru Chalice.name: Central Pthumeru Chalice
Central Pthumeru Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
But only a Root Chalice changes the shape of the 
old labyrinth when used in a ritual.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked 
the wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Watchdog of the Old Lords in Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Three.

Sinister Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice.name: Sinister Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice
Sinister Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice.description:
Root chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
When used in a ritual, this sinister chalice summons the
Sinister Resonant Bell. The bell-ringing woman appears to be
a mad Pthumerian.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked the 
wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
Note: Additional rite Sinister Bell is for online use only.
The bell-ringing woman does not appear offline.
availability_list: Sold by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Chalice Bath Messengers, in Lower Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Four, for 9000 Blood Echoes. Behind an illusory wall which guarded by Keeper of the Old Lords.

Lower Ailing Loran Chalice.name: Lower Ailing Loran Chalice
Lower Ailing Loran Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
But only a Root Chalice changes the shape of the
Chalice Dungeon when used in a ritual.
There are trace remains of medical procedures in 
parts of ailing Loran. Whether these were attempts to
control the scourge of the beast, or the cause of the 
outbreak, is unknown.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Abhorrent Beast in Ailing Loran Layer Three.

Ailing Loran Chalice.name: Ailing Loran Chalice
Ailing Loran Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
Loran is a tragic land that was devoured by the sands.
The tragedy that struck this ailing land of Loran
is said to have its roots in the scourge of the beast.
Some have made the dreaded extrapolation that
Yharnam may be next.
availability_list: Dropped by (Main Game): Amygdala in Nightmare Frontier Amygdala's Chamber.

Sinister Isz Root Chalice.name: Sinister Isz Root Chalice
Sinister Isz Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
When used in a ritual, this sinister chalice summons the
Sinister Resonant Bell. The bell-ringing woman appears to be 
a mad Pthumerian.
According to the Choir, the land of Izs lies in contact
with the cosmos, which allowed the Great Ones to
function on transcendental planes of thought.
Note: Additional rite Sinister Bell is for online use only.
The bell-ringing woman does not appear offline.
availability_list: Sold by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Chalice Bath Messengers, in Isz Gravestone Layer Three, for 20000 Blood Echoes.

Lower Pthumeru Chalice.name: Lower Pthumeru Chalice
Lower Pthumeru Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
But only a Root Chalice changes the shape of the
old labyrinth when used in a ritual.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked
the wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Pthumerian Descendant in Central Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Three.

Pthumeru Chalice.name: Pthumeru Chalice
Pthumeru Chalice.description:
Ritual chalice found in the Church of the Good Chalice. 
Use in a ritual at the tomb altar in the Hunter's Dream 
to break the seal of the old underground labyrinth. 
Let the chalice reveal the tomb of the gods; let blood 
be the hunter's nourishment.
...And let ye partake in communion...
availability_list: Dropped by (Main Game): Blood-starved Beast in Old Yharnam Church of the Good Chalice.

Pthumeru Root Chalice.name: Pthumeru Root Chalice
Pthumeru Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break old labyrinth
seals, are said to change the labyrinth's form each time.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked
the wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon):  Merciless Watchers & Chieftain in Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Two.

Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice.name: Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice
Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break old labyrinth
seals, are said to change the labyrinth's form each time.
The hintertombs are unceremonious homes to graves
and death, cesspools of noxious snakes and insects.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Forgotten Madman / Escort in Lower Hintertomb Layer Two.

Great Pthumeru Ihyll Chalice.name: Great Pthumeru Ihyll Chalice
Great Pthumeru Ihyll Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
Great chalices unlock deeper reaches of the labyrinth.
Pthumeru Ihyll was the title of both the
Pthumerian monarch and its capital.
This reveals that while early Pthumerians were mere
humble guardians of the slumbering Great Ones, their
descendants felt entitled to name themselves a leader.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Amygdala in Cursed Pthumerian Defilement Layer Three.

Great Isz Chalice.name: Great Isz Chalice
Great Isz Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
Great chalices unlock deeper reaches of the labyrinth. The
Great Isz Chalice became the cornerstone of the Choir, the
elite delegation of the Healing Church.
It was also the first Great Chalice brought back to the 
surface since the time of Byrgenwerth, and allowed the
Choir to have audience with Ebrietas.
availability_list: Dropped by Ebrietas, Daughter of the Cosmos in Altar of Despair.

Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice.name: Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice
Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
This cursed chalice makes a special ritual possible, but must
not be used lightly, as the resulting transformation can be
utterly drastic.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked
the wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Watchdog of the Old Lords in Pthumerian Defilement Layer Two.

Central Pthumeru Root Chalice.name: Central Pthumeru Root Chalice
Central Pthumeru Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break old labyrinth
seals, are said to change the labyrinth's form each time.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked
the wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Keeper of the Old Lords in Central Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Two.

Defiled Chalice.name: Defiled Chalice
Defiled Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
Only, this defiled chalice is cursed.
Curses are caused by inciting the anger of the Great Ones,
and used to hex others. Special materials are required to
complete the ritual.
To try one's hand at curses, first seek the Bastard of Loran.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Bloodletting Beast in Lower Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Four

Sinister Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.name: Sinister Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice
Sinister Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
When used in a ritual, this sinister chalice summons
the Sinister Resonant Bell. The bell-ringing woman
appears to be a mad Pthumerian.
The Pthumerian monarch was traditionally a woman
who assumed a name with classical roots.
Note: Additional rite Sinister Bell is for online use only.
the bell-ringing woman does not appear offline.
availability_list: Sold by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Chalice Bath Messengers for 16000 Blood Echoes in Pthumeru Ihyll Layer Three.

Ailing Loran Root Chalice.name: Ailing Loran Root Chalice
Ailing Loran Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break labyrinth

availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Blood-starved Beast in Ailing Loran Layer Two.

Sinister Lower Loran Root Chalice.name: Sinister Lower Loran Root Chalice
Sinister Lower Loran Root Chalice.description:

When used in a ritual, this sinister chalice summons the

There are trace remains of medical procedures in parts of
ailing Loran. Whether these were attempts to control the

Isz Root Chalice.name: Isz Root Chalice
Isz Root Chalice.description:

Root Chalices, used in rituals to break labyrinth

According to the Choir, the land of Izs lies in contact

function on transcendental planes of thought.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Ebrietas, Daughter of the Cosmos in Isz Gravestone Layer Three.

Hintertomb Chalice.name: Hintertomb Chalice
Hintertomb Chalice.description:
A chalice that breaks a labyrinth seal.
Hintertombs are the peripheral catacombs
of the old underground labyrinth.
To this day, the Watcher continue to expand the
hintertombs, unceremonious catacombs filled with
graves and death.
availability_list: Treasure in (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Found inside the coffin within side area before layer lamp of Central Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Two.

Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice.name: Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice
Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice.description:
Root Chalice that breaks multiple labyrinth seals.
Root Chalices, used in rituals to break old labyrinth
seals, are said to change the labyrinth's form each time.
The old labyrinth was carved out by the Pthumerians,
superhuman beings that are said to have unlocked
the wisdom of the eldritch Truth.
availability_list: Dropped by (Preset Chalice Dungeon): Rom, the Vacuous Spider in Lower Pthumerian Labyrinth Layer Three

Lower Hintertomb Chalice.description:
